#Does anyone understand Topcoder here ? <VigzMv/>
def ppp(y):
	y = str(y)
	q = -1
	for g in range(len(y)):
		if y[g] == y[q]:
			ff = 0
		else:
			ff = 1
			break
		q -=1
	if ff == 0:
		return True
	else:
		return False

for b in range(int(raw_input())):
	c = input()
	while True:
		c += 1
		if ppp(c) == True:
			print c
			break
